verses.text: \w O|strong="H2142"\w* Lord, \w be|strong="H1732"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* bitter \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H2142"\w* wrath; \w let|strong="H2142"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H2142"\w* hand \w be|strong="H1732"\w* on \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* heat \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H2142"\w* passion.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* arrows \w have|strong="H3068"\w* gone into \w my|strong="H3068"\w* flesh, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* crushed under \w the|strong="H3068"\w* weight \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* flesh \w is|strong="H3027"\w* wasted \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* there \w is|strong="H3027"\w* no peace \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sin.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* crimes \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w gone|strong="H0369"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w*; \w they|strong="H0369"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H0369"\w* great weight which \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w* than \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w strength|strong="H6106"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3588"\w* wounds \w are|strong="H5771"\w* poisoned \w and|strong="H7218"\w* evil-smelling, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* foolish behaviour.
I am troubled, I am \w made|strong="H0887"\w* low; I go weeping all \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* body \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* burning; \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* flesh \w is|strong="H3117"\w* unhealthy.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am feeble \w and|strong="H1320"\w* crushed \w down|strong="H3588"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H4390"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* cry like \w a|strong="H3588"\w* lion \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* grief \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart.

Lord, \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* desire \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*; \w my|strong="H5704"\w* sorrow \w is|strong="H3820"\w* not kept secret \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* heart goes \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* pain, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w is|strong="H3605"\w* wasting \w away|strong="H4480"\w*; as \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* light \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* eyes, \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w gone|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w My|strong="H0854"\w* lovers \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H0854"\w* friends keep \w away|strong="H0369"\w* \w from|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H0854"\w* disease; \w my|strong="H0854"\w* relations keep far \w away|strong="H0369"\w*.

Those \w who|strong="H7350"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* \w a|strong="H5975"\w* \w desire|strong="H7453"\w* \w to|strong="H7138"\w* \w take|strong="H5975"\w* \w my|strong="H5048"\w* life put nets \w for|strong="H5061"\w* \w me|strong="H5048"\w*; those \w who|strong="H7350"\w* \w are|strong="H7350"\w* designing \w my|strong="H5048"\w* destruction say evil things \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, all \w the|strong="H0157"\w* day \w their|strong="H5975"\w* minds \w are|strong="H7350"\w* full \w of|strong="H5061"\w* deceit.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* kept \w my|strong="H3605"\w* ears shut \w like|strong="H1897"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* without hearing; \w like|strong="H1897"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* without \w a|strong="H1696"\w* voice, never opening \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w man|strong="H2795"\w* whose ears \w are|strong="H6310"\w* shut, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* whose \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* there \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* sharp \w words|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Lord, \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hope: \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* answer, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Lord, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, Let \w them|strong="H0859"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H0859"\w*; \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foot \w is|strong="H3068"\w* moved, let \w them|strong="H0859"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* lifted up \w with|strong="H3068"\w* pride against \w me|strong="H0859"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w are|strong="H7272"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* falling, \w and|strong="H7272"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* clear \w my|strong="H3588"\w* wrongdoing, \w with|strong="H3588"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H4341"\w* \w in|strong="H3559"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* sin.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5771"\w* strong \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* hate \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* without cause: \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5771"\w* \w against|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* falsely \w are|strong="H5771"\w* increased \w in|strong="H5046"\w* numbers.

They \w give|strong="H2416"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w* back evil \w for|strong="H8267"\w* good; they are \w my|strong="H8267"\w* haters because I go after \w the|strong="H8130"\w* thing which \w is|strong="H8267"\w* right.
\w Do|strong="H7999"\w* not give \w me|strong="H7291"\w* up, O Lord; O \w my|strong="H8478"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w*, \w be|strong="H7853"\w* near \w to|strong="H7291"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w*.
Come quickly \w to|strong="H3068"\w* give \w me|strong="H4480"\w* help, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation.
